original_text: Besides the regular burnt offering with its drink offering, one male goat is to be presented to the Lord as a sin offering.
korean_text: 또 상번제와 그 전제 외에 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄제로 여호와께 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Besides the regular burnt offering with its drink offering
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 드리는 번제와 그 소제물 외에

sentences.original_text: one male goat is to be presented to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 숫염소 한 마리를 주께 드려야 하며
